description: Try our easy to follow Salted Caramel & Ricotta Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Aug 2020,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Salted Caramel & Ricotta Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cream cheese, ricotta, vanilla, cinnamon, caramel sauce and a pinch of salt in a food processor. Process until smooth. Transfer to a serving dish. See tip for suggested toppings.
